links.*: Letter to H. Cotton Minchin (14 November 1962)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==April==
* '''[[12 April|12]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 237]].
* '''[[15 April|15]]''' - Actor [[Tom Kane]] is born.
* '''[[24 April|24]]''' - [[Henry Gee]] is born.
* '''?''' - Actress [[Tatyana Yassukovich]] is born.
==July==
* '''[[2 July|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien|J.R.R.]] and [[Edith Tolkien]] make a trip to [[Bournemouth]].
* '''[[3 July|3]]''' - [[Alina Dadlez]] writes [[Letter to Alina Dadlez (20 July 1962)|a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* '''[[18 July|18]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 238]].
* '''[[20 July|20]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 239]].
* '''[[20 July|20]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Alina Dadlez (20 July 1962)|a letter to Alina Dadlez]].
* '''[[21 July|21]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 239a]].
==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 240]].
* '''[[31 August|31]]''' - Actor [[Dee Bradley Baker]] is born.
==September==
* '''[[8 September|8]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] begins writing [[letter 241]].
* '''[[14 September|14]]''' - An Argentinian publisher [[Letter to Alina Dadlez (19 September 1962)|writes to J.R.R. Tolkien]] about a translation into Spanish of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (''[[El hobito]]'').
* '''[[17 September|17]]''' - [[Alina Dadlez]] writes [[Letter to Alina Dadlez (19 September 1962)|a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* '''[[19 September|19]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Alina Dadlez (19 September 1962)|a letter to Alina Dadlez]].
* '''[[20 September|20]]''' - Cartoonist [[Bill Amend]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Matt Blessing]], the head of [[Marquette University]] archives, is born.
==October==
* '''[[13 October|13]]''' - [[Tim Tolkien]] is born.
* '''[[22 October|22]]''' - ''[[O Gnomo]]'', the first Portuguese translation of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', is published.
==November==
* '''[[2 November|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 241a]].
* '''[[14 November|14]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to H. Cotton Minchin (14 November 1962)|a letter to H. Cotton Minchin]].
* '''[[19 November|19]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 241b]].
* '''[[20 November|20]]''' - [[C. S. Lewis]] writes a letter to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* '''[[22 November|22]]''' - ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'' is published.
* '''[[22 November|22]]''' â€“ A review in ''The Listener'' calls ''The Adventures of Tom Bombadil'' "close to genius".
* '''[[23 November|23]]''' - The literary supplement of  ''The Times'' runs a review of  ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]''.
* '''[[28 November|28]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 242]].
==December==
* '''[[7 December|7]]''' - ''[[Ancrene Wisse]]'', [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s edition of a [[Middle English]] manuscript, is published.
* '''[[10 December|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien|interviewed by John Bowen]].
* '''[[16 December|16]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 242a]].
* '''[[19 December|19]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 243]].
